Package net.minecraftforge.client.model

Class ItemLayerModel

java.lang.Object
net.minecraftforge.client.model.ItemLayerModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
IModelGeometry<ItemLayerModel>
public final class ItemLayerModel extends Object implements IModelGeometry<ItemLayerModel>
Forge reimplementation of vanilla ItemModelGenerator, i.e. builtin/generated models, with the following changes: - Represented as a true UnbakedModel so it can be baked as usual instead of using special-case logic like vanilla does. - Various fixes in the baking logic. - Not limited to 4 layers maximum.
